comments.raw_text: We should warn when let shadows vars or arguments, at least when JSOPTION_STRICT. This would be a good early-error-finding improvement for JS developers able to take advantage of it.
comments.creator: wes@page.ca
comments.author: wes@page.ca
comments.text: We should warn when let shadows vars or arguments, at least when JSOPTION_STRICT. This would be a good early-error-finding improvement for JS developers able to take advantage of it.
